title: Mini-Ep 121: Oil Change
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 121: Oil Change
itunes:subtitle: Kate is sad the days are getting shorter and Doree enjoys a relaxing day in the park. Then they hear from listeners requesting face oil recommendations and an update on Kate’s ingrown hair. Plus, Doree gives some unexpected COVID-19 wedding advice....
description:
Kate is sad the days are getting shorter and Doree enjoys a relaxing day in the park. Then they hear from listeners requesting face oil recommendations and an update on Kate’s ingrown hair. Plus, Doree gives some unexpected COVID-19 wedding advice. 


Activity/Word of the Day: 5 minute breathing exercise. Kate likes this one.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. For info on Forever35 Office Hours, click here.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

ANASTASIA - Go to AnastasiaBeverlyHills.com today, and use promo code FOREVER35 to get 15% off your first order.

OXICLEAN - To Work your Magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/TRYME and order a free sample.

CALM - For for 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

PRETTY LITTER - For 20% off your first order visit prettylitter.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.

MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER10 at checkout.

ATHENA CLUB - Athena Club is a better self-care routine made simple. Just go to AthenaClub.com and use promo code FOREVER35 for 15% off today! 


Theme music by Riot.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
